original_text: They said to him, “He will put those wretches to a miserable death and let out the vineyard to other tenants who will give him the fruits in their seasons.”
korean_text: 그들이 말하되 그 악한 자들을 진멸하고 포도원은 제 때에 열매를 바칠 만한 다른 농부들에게 세로 줄지니이다

sentences.original_text: He will put those wretches to a miserable death
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 악한 자들을 끔찍한 죽음에 처하고,

sentences.original_text: and let out the vineyard to other tenants
sentences.korean_translation: 포도원을 다른 농부들에게 세를 줄 것이라

sentences.original_text: who will give him the fruits in their seasons.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 제때에 열매를 그에게 줄 것들이니라.”
